thread.title: Cows 'should wear flourescent jackets and strings of lights' at night, council says
thread.title_full: Cows 'should wear flourescent jackets and strings of lights' at night, council says

author: Victoria Ward
title: Cows 'should wear flourescent jackets and strings of lights' at night, council says
text: How about that? Cows 'should wear flourescent jackets and strings of lights' at night, council says Town mayor makes unlikely proposal in a bid to prevent cattle being hit by cars on Hungerford common Cows wearing flourescent strips at night
